mapper.select: SELECT continent_no, continent_name FROM tm_continent
SELECT country_no, country_name FROM tm_country WHERE continent_no = #{no}
SELECT league_no, league_name FROM tm_league WHERE country_no = #{no}
SELECT club_no, club_name FROM tm_club WHERE league_no = #{no}

SELECT a1.country_no, a1.country_name, a1.league_no, a1.league_name, IFNULL(a1.clubs,0) clubs, IFNULL(SUM(a2.players),0) players, IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(a2.player_mv),2),0) player_mv, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(a2.player_age),2),0) player_age FROM (SELECT b.country_no, b.country_name, b.league_no, b.league_name, count(a.club_no) clubs FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_view_league b ON a.league_no = b.league_no WHERE b.continent_no = #{no} GROUP BY b.country_no, b.league_no) a1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.league_no, a.club_no, COUNT(a.player_no) players, SUM(a.player_mv) player_mv, AVG(a.player_age) player_age FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_club b ON a.club_no = b.club_no GROUP BY a.club_no) a2 ON a1.league_no = a2.league_no GROUP BY a1.league_no ORDER BY player_mv DESC, country_no DESC
SELECT a.league_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, b.continent_no, b.continent_name FROM tm_league a INNER JOIN tm_view_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no WHERE a.league_no = #{no}

SELECT a.club_no, a.club_name, COUNT(b.player_no) players, IFNULL(CAST(AVG(b.player_age) AS DECIMAL(4,2)),0) age, IFNULL(CAST(SUM(b.player_mv) AS DECIMAL(5,2)),0) mv FROM tm_club a LEFT JOIN tm_player b ON a.club_no = b.club_no WHERE a.league_no = #{no} GROUP BY a.club_no

SELECT c.league_no, c.club_no, c.club_name, IFNULL(bb.attempts,0) attempts, IFNULL(bb.win,0) win, IFNULL(bb.draw,0) draw, IFNULL(bb.lose,0) lose, IFNULL(bb.vp,0) vp FROM tm_club c
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT d1.league_no, d1.club_no, d1.club_name, d1.attempts, d1.win, d1.draw, d1.attempts-(d1.win+d1.draw) lose, (d1.win*3 + d1.draw) vp FROM (SELECT c1.league_no, c1.club_no, c1.club_name, c1.attempts, IFNULL(c2.win,0) win, IFNULL(c2.draw,0) draw FROM (SELECT league_no, club_no, club_name, SUM(attempts) attempts FROM ( (SELECT b.league_no, b.club_no, b.club_name, COUNT(b.club_no) attempts FROM tm_match a INNER JOIN tm_club b ON a.match_home = b.club_no WHERE match_end = 0 GROUP BY b.club_no)
UNION ALL
(SELECT b.league_no, b.club_no, b.club_name, COUNT(b.club_no) attempts FROM tm_match a INNER JOIN tm_club b ON a.match_away = b.club_no WHERE match_end = 0 GROUP BY b.club_no) ) a1 GROUP BY club_no) c1
LEFT JOIN
((SELECT b1.club_no, b1.club_name, IFNULL(b1.win,0) win, IFNULL(b2.draw,0) draw FROM (SELECT a1.club_no, a1.club_name, SUM(a1.win) win FROM ( (SELECT a.league_no, a.club_no, a.club_name, count(b.match_no) win FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_match b ON a.club_no = b.match_home WHERE b.match_end = 0 AND b.match_win = a.club_no GROUP BY a.club_no)
UNION ALL
(SELECT a.league_no, a.club_no, a.club_name, count(b.match_no) win FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_match b ON a.club_no = b.match_away WHERE b.match_end = 0 AND b.match_win = a.club_no GROUP BY a.club_no) ) a1 GROUP BY a1.club_no) b1
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT a2.club_no, a2.club_name, SUM(a2.draw) draw FROM ((SELECT a.league_no, a.club_no, a.club_name, count(b.match_no) draw FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_match b ON a.club_no = b.match_home WHERE b.match_end = 0 AND b.match_win = 0 GROUP BY a.club_no)
UNION ALL
(SELECT a.league_no, a.club_no, a.club_name, count(b.match_no) draw FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_match b ON a.club_no = b.match_away WHERE b.match_end = 0 AND b.match_win = 0 GROUP BY a.club_no)) a2 GROUP BY a2.club_no) b2
ON b1.club_no = b2.club_no)
UNION
(SELECT b2.club_no, b2.club_name, b1.win, b2.draw FROM (SELECT a1.club_no, a1.club_name, SUM(a1.win) win FROM ((SELECT a.league_no, a.club_no, a.club_name, count(b.match_no) win FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_match b ON a.club_no = b.match_home WHERE b.match_end = 0 AND b.match_win = a.club_no GROUP BY a.club_no)
UNION ALL
(SELECT a.league_no, a.club_no, a.club_name, count(b.match_no) win FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_match b ON a.club_no = b.match_away WHERE b.match_end = 0 AND b.match_win = a.club_no GROUP BY a.club_no)) a1 GROUP BY a1.club_no) b1
RIGHT JOIN
(SELECT a2.club_no, a2.club_name, SUM(a2.draw) draw FROM ( (SELECT a.league_no, a.club_no, a.club_name, count(b.match_no) draw FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_match b ON a.club_no = b.match_home WHERE b.match_end = 0 AND b.match_win = 0 GROUP BY a.club_no)
UNION ALL
(SELECT a.league_no, a.club_no, a.club_name, count(b.match_no) draw FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_match b ON a.club_no = b.match_away WHERE b.match_end = 0 AND b.match_win = 0 GROUP BY a.club_no) ) a2 GROUP BY a2.club_no) b2 ON b1.club_no = b2.club_no)) c2 ON c1.club_no = c2.club_no) d1 ) bb ON c.club_no = bb.club_no WHERE c.league_no = #{no} ORDER BY vp DESC, win DESC, draw DESC

SELECT a1.*, c.country_name FROM tm_country c RIGHT JOIN (SELECT a.player_no, a.country_no, a.player_name, b.club_no, b.club_name, a.player_mv FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_club b ON a.club_no = b.club_no WHERE b.league_no = #{no}) a1 ON c.country_no = a1.country_no ORDER BY player_mv DESC, player_no ASC LIMIT 3

SELECT a1.player_no, a1.player_name, a1.club_no, a1.club_name, IFNULL(a2.attempts,0) attempts, IFNULL(a2.goal,0) goal FROM (SELECT a.player_no, a.player_name, b.club_no, b.club_name FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_club b ON a.club_no = b.club_no WHERE b.league_no = #{no}) a1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.player_no, COUNT(b.match_no) attempts, SUM(b.goal) goal FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_point b ON a.player_no = b.player_no GROUP BY a.player_no) a2 ON a1.player_no = a2.player_no ORDER BY goal DESC, attempts ASC, player_no ASC LIMIT 6

SELECT a1.player_no, a1.player_name, a1.club_no, a1.club_name, IFNULL(a2.attempts,0) attempts, IFNULL(a2.assist,0) assist FROM (SELECT a.player_no, a.player_name, b.club_no, b.club_name FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_club b ON a.club_no = b.club_no WHERE b.league_no = #{no}) a1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.player_no, COUNT(b.match_no) attempts, SUM(b.assist) assist FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_point b ON a.player_no = b.player_no GROUP BY a.player_no) a2 ON a1.player_no = a2.player_no ORDER BY assist DESC, attempts ASC, player_no ASC LIMIT 6

SELECT c.country_name, a1.* FROM (SELECT a.*, b.club_name FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_club b ON a.club_no = b.club_no WHERE a.player_no = #{no} ) a1 INNER JOIN tm_country c ON c.country_no = a1.country_no
mapper.update: UPDATE tm_player SET player_hit = player_hit+1 WHERE player_no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.league_name FROM tm_club a INNER JOIN tm_league b ON a.league_no = b.league_no WHERE club_no = #{no}

SELECT a3.country_no, a3.country_name, a3.player_no, a3.player_name, a3.player_backnum, a3.player_mv, a3.player_position1, a3.player_position2 FROM (SELECT d.country_name, c.* FROM tm_player c INNER JOIN tm_country d ON c.country_no = d.country_no) a3 INNER JOIN (SELECT a1.*, b.club_no FROM tm_club b INNER JOIN (SELECT a.country_name, b.league_no FROM tm_country a INNER JOIN tm_league b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 ON b.league_no = a1.league_no WHERE b.club_no = #{no}) a2 ON a3.club_no = a2.club_no ORDER BY FIELD (player_position1, 'Goalkeeper', 'Defender', 'Midfielder', 'Forward'), player_position2 DESC

SELECT a3.country_no, a3.country_name, a3.player_no, a3.player_name, a3.player_backnum, a3.player_mv, a3.player_position1, a3.player_position2 FROM (SELECT d.country_name, c.* FROM tm_player c INNER JOIN tm_country d ON c.country_no = d.country_no) a3 INNER JOIN (SELECT a1.*, b.club_no FROM tm_club b INNER JOIN (SELECT a.country_name, b.league_no FROM tm_country a INNER JOIN tm_league b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 ON b.league_no = a1.league_no WHERE b.club_no = #{no}) a2 ON a3.club_no = a2.club_no ORDER BY a3.player_mv DESC ASC, FIELD(player_position1, 'Goalkeeper', 'Defender', 'Midfielder', 'Forward'), player_position2 DESC

SELECT a1.* FROM (SELECT a.coach_no, a.coach_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.coach_age, a.coach_formation FROM tm_coach a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_club c ON a1.coach_no = c.coach_no WHERE c.club_no = #{no}

SELECT a1.* FROM (SELECT a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2 FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_club c ON a1.player_no = c.club_captain WHERE c.club_no = #{no}

SELECT a1.* FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2, a.player_mv FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_club c ON a1.club_no = c.club_no WHERE c.club_no = #{no} ORDER BY a1.player_mv DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a1.*, SUM(c.goal) goal, SUM(c.assist) assist FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2 FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_point c ON a1.player_no = c.player_no WHERE a1.club_no = #{no} GROUP BY a1.player_no ORDER BY goal DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a1.*, SUM(c.goal) goal, SUM(c.assist) assist FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2 FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_point c ON a1.player_no = c.player_no WHERE a1.club_no = #{no} GROUP BY a1.player_no ORDER BY assist DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a1.*, SUM(c.goal) goal, SUM(c.assist) assist, SUM(c.goal + c.assist) point FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2 FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_point c ON a1.player_no = c.player_no WHERE a1.club_no = #{no} GROUP BY a1.player_no ORDER BY point DESC;
SELECT * FROM tm_coach WHERE coach_no = #{no}
SELECT * FROM tm_agent WHERE agent_no = #{no}

SELECT b1.match_no, b1.club_stadium, b1.match_date, SUBSTR( _UTF8'일월화수목금토', DAYOFWEEK(match_date), 1) AS week, DATE_FORMAT(b1.match_kickoff, '%H:%i') match_kickoff, b1.league_no home_league, b1.league_name home_league_name, b1.match_home, b1.club_name home_name, b2.league_no away_league, b2.league_name away_league_name, b2.match_away, b2.club_name away_name FROM (SELECT a.match_date, a.match_kickoff, a.match_home, a1.club_name, a.match_no, a1.club_stadium, a1.league_no, a1.league_name FROM tm_match a INNER JOIN (SELECT b.*, c.league_name FROM tm_club b INNER JOIN tm_league c ON b.league_no = c.league_no) a1 ON a.match_home = a1.club_no WHERE a.match_no = #{no} ORDER BY a.match_date ASC, a.match_kickoff ASC) b1 INNER JOIN (SELECT d.match_away, a2.club_name, d.match_no, a2.league_no, a2.league_name FROM tm_match d INNER JOIN (SELECT e.*, f.league_name FROM tm_club e INNER JOIN tm_league f ON e.league_no = f.league_no) a2 ON d.match_away = a2.club_no ORDER BY d.match_date ASC, d.match_kickoff ASC) b2 ON b1.match_no = b2.match_no
SELECT match_home, match_away FROM tm_match WHERE match_no = #{no}
SELECT a.*, b.goal, b.assist FROM tm_view_mv_age a INNER JOIN tm_view_point b ON a.club_no = b.club_no WHERE a.club_no IN (#{home}, #{away}) ORDER BY FIELD (a.club_no, #{home}, #{away})

SELECT a1.* FROM (SELECT a.coach_no, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.coach_name, a.coach_age, a.coach_formation FROM tm_coach a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_club c ON a1.coach_no = c.coach_no WHERE c.club_no IN (#{home}, #{away}) ORDER BY FIELD (c.club_no, #{home}, #{away});

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a2.*, SUM(d.goal) goal, SUM(d.assist) assist, SUM(d.goal + d.assist) point, COUNT(point_no) attempts FROM tm_point d INNER JOIN (SELECT a1.*, c.club_name FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2 FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_club c ON a1.club_no = c.club_no WHERE c.club_no IN (#{home}, #{away})) a2 ON d.player_no = a2.player_no GROUP BY d.player_no, a2.club_no ORDER BY point DESC) b1 GROUP BY b1.club_no ORDER BY FIELD (b1.club_no, #{home}, #{away})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a2.*, SUM(d.goal) goal, SUM(d.assist) assist, COUNT(point_no) attempts FROM tm_point d INNER JOIN (SELECT a1.*, c.club_name FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2 FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_club c ON a1.club_no = c.club_no WHERE c.club_no IN (#{home}, #{away})) a2 ON d.player_no = a2.player_no GROUP BY d.player_no, a2.club_no ORDER BY goal DESC) b1 GROUP BY b1.club_no ORDER BY FIELD (b1.club_no, #{home}, #{away})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a2.*, SUM(d.goal) goal, SUM(d.assist) assist, COUNT(point_no) attempts FROM tm_point d INNER JOIN (SELECT a1.*, c.club_name FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2 FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no) a1 INNER JOIN tm_club c ON a1.club_no = c.club_no WHERE c.club_no IN (#{home}, #{away})) a2 ON d.player_no = a2.player_no GROUP BY d.player_no, a2.club_no ORDER BY assist DESC) b1 GROUP BY b1.club_no ORDER BY FIELD (b1.club_no, #{home}, #{away})

SELECT a1.club_no, a1.player_no, a1.player_name, a1.country_no, a1.country_name, a1.player_age, a1.player_position1, a1.player_position2, MAX(a1.player_mv) player_mv, c.club_name FROM (SELECT a.club_no, a.player_no, a.player_name, a.country_no, b.country_name, a.player_mv, a.player_age, a.player_position1, a.player_position2 FROM tm_player a INNER JOIN tm_country b ON a.country_no = b.country_no ORDER BY a.player_mv DESC) a1 INNER JOIN tm_club c ON a1.club_no = c.club_no WHERE c.club_no IN (#{home}, #{away}) GROUP BY a1.club_no ORDER BY FIELD (a1.club_no, #{home}, #{away})

SELECT b1.match_no, b1.club_stadium, b1.match_date, SUBSTR( _UTF8'일월화수목금토', DAYOFWEEK(match_date), 1) AS week, DATE_FORMAT(b1.match_kickoff, '%H:%i') match_kickoff, b1.league_no home_league, b1.league_name home_league_name, b1.match_home, b1.club_name home_name, b2.league_no away_league, b2.league_name away_league_name, b2.match_away, b2.club_name away_name FROM (SELECT a.match_date, a.match_kickoff, a.match_home, a1.club_name, a.match_no, a.champs_group, a1.club_stadium, a1.league_no, a1.league_name FROM tm_champs_match a INNER JOIN (SELECT b.*, c.league_name FROM tm_club b INNER JOIN tm_league c ON b.league_no = c.league_no) a1 ON a.match_home = a1.club_no WHERE a.match_no = #{no} ORDER BY a.match_date ASC, a.match_kickoff ASC) b1 INNER JOIN (SELECT d.match_away, a2.club_name, d.match_no, a2.league_no, a2.league_name FROM tm_champs_match d INNER JOIN (SELECT e.*, f.league_name FROM tm_club e INNER JOIN tm_league f ON e.league_no = f.league_no) a2 ON d.match_away = a2.club_no ORDER BY d.match_date ASC, d.match_kickoff ASC) b2 ON b1.match_no = b2.match_no
SELECT match_home, match_away FROM tm_champs_match WHERE match_no = #{no}
SELECT a.*, b.goal, b.assist FROM tm_view_mv_age a INNER JOIN tm_view_point b ON a.club_no = b.club_no WHERE a.club_no IN (#{home}, #{away})
